Title: Bleach the Movie: Hell Verse
Actors: Masakazu Morita, Fumiko Orikasa, Kazuya Nakai, Noriaki Sugiyama
Plot: When Ichigo's sister Yuzu is kidnapped by sinners & he is asked to do something for them in order to get his sister released. Ichigo must find a way to take his sister back form hell with the help of Rukia, Renji & Uryu.
